episode_summary: This episode covers a variety of topics including the public's indifference to Marmite, the lesser-known Knights of the Round Table, the British Ministry of Defence's ownership of golf courses, and the environmental impact of contraceptive pills on fish.

facts.fact: According to a 2011 YouGov survey, 27% of Britons neither love nor hate Marmite.
The Knights of the Round Table included Lancelot, Gawain, Galahad, and Gareth.
The Ministry of Defence owns 15 golf courses.
The rise in the use of female contraceptive pills is causing fish to become too effeminate.
